meanings.sent1: I will detasselling the corn plants in the field tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: Farmers detasselling corn to improve crop yield.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried detasselling the sunflowers in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Detasselling the weeds of doubt from his mind, he found clarity.
meanings.sent5: The strong wind detasselling the flowers, scattering petals everywhere.

meanings.definition: The act of removing the tassel from a plant, typically corn.
meanings.sent1: Detasselling is an important step in corn farming.
meanings.sent2: During detasselling, workers carefully remove the tassels from each corn stalk.
meanings.sent3: The detasselling competition at the county fair was surprisingly intense.
meanings.sent4: In the field of corn, detasselling stood out like a lone flower in a meadow.
meanings.sent5: The detasselling process ensures the purity of the corn crop.
